name: mabl-azure-devops-extension
description: Run your mabl tests in your Azure DevOps pipelines
author: mabl

inputs.name: apiKey
inputs.label: API key
inputs.helpMarkDown: A mabl API key obtained from the mabl app settings/API page

inputs.name: applicationId
inputs.label: Application ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ID of the application you'd like to run tests against

inputs.name: environmentId
inputs.label: Environment ID
inputs.helpMarkDown: A mabl API key obtained from the mabl app settings/API page

inputs.name: browserTypes
inputs.label: Browser override list
inputs.helpMarkDown: comma seperated list (no spaces) of browsers to override the plan settings with i.e. internet_explorer, safari, chrome, firefox

inputs.name: uri
inputs.label: Starting URL override
inputs.helpMarkDown: a valid URL to override the plans with as a starting URL

inputs.name: rebaselineImages
inputs.label: Rebaseline visual change models
inputs.helpMarkDown: Rebaseline visual change models on deployment

inputs.name: setStaticBaseline
inputs.label: Set as fixed baseline for visual change models
inputs.helpMarkDown: Set as fixed baseline for visual change models

inputs.name: continueOnPlanFailure
inputs.label: Set Static Baseline
inputs.helpMarkDown: Continue the build/release pipeline even if a plan fails
